data.title: About Our Stocks
data.meta_description: The Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group website's stock information page.
data.text:
When is the General Shareholders’ Meeting held?

The shareholders’ meeting is held during June every year. For further information, please see “Event Calendar.”

On what stock exchanges are the shares of SMFG listed?

SMFG’s common shares are listed on the Prime Market of the Tokyo Stock Exchange and the Premier Market of the Nagoya Stock Exchange.

SMFG’s American Depositary Receipts (ADRs) are also listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE). Please click here for further information about ADRs.

What is SMFG's trading code number for domestic exchanges?

It is “8316.”

What is SMFG’s ticker symbol on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE)?

It is “SMFG.”
